Rengar.name: Rengarº
Rengar.title: ºøthe Pridestalkerº
Rengar.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøOn every wall of his den, the trophy hunter Rengar mounts the heads, horns, claws, and fangs of the most lethal creatures in Valoran. Though his collection is extensive, he remains unsatisfied, tirelessly seeking greater game. He takes time with every kill, studying his prey, learning, and preparing himself for the next encounter with the one monster he never managed to defeat.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRengar never knew his real parents, but was raised by a human who was revered as a legendary hunter. He was an ideal pupil, intently absorbing the lessons of his father, and improving them with his uncanny feral instincts. Before his mane had fully grown, Rengar set off on his own and claimed a wide territory for himself. Along its perimeter, he mounted the skulls of his slain prey - a warning to would-be aggressors. He thought undisputed reign of a region would fulfill him, but instead, he grew restless. No beasts in his domain proved challenging prey, and without formidable adversaries to push his limits, Rengar's spirit waned. He feared that no worthwhile game remained, that he would never again feel the thrill of the hunt. Just when things seemed their bleakest, he encountered the monster. It was a disturbing, alien thing, distinctly out of place in his world. It bore huge scything claws and devoured any animal that strayed across its path. Overzealous at the prospect of a challenge, Rengar ambushed the monster in haste. It far outclassed anything he'd hunted before. Their fight was savage, and each suffered crippling wounds. Rengar lost an eye, but the most grievous blow was to his pride. He had never before failed to make the kill. Worse yet, the severity of his injuries forced him to retreat. Over the following days, he hovered on the threshold between life and death. He was wracked with pain, but beneath it, he felt a glimmer of joy. The hunt was on. If such powerful beings existed in the world, he would find them, and stack their heads high. The monster, however, was a kill he wanted to savor. On his den's largest wall, he reserves a space for the beast's head, a trophy he swears will one day be the centerpiece of his collection.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''Prey on the weak and you will survive, prey on the strong and you will live.''øºøºøºøº
º-- Rengarº
Rengar.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøOn every wall of his den, the trophy hunter Rengar mounts the heads, horns, claws, and fangs of the most lethal creatures in Valoran. Though his collection is extensive, he remains unsatisfied, tirelessly seeking ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøUse Rengar's ultimate to find and assassinate high priority targets in team fights and skirmishes.øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøA lot of Rengar's power comes from empowered abilities he uses at the right moment - choose wisely!øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøMake sure to take paths through brush when chasing opponents to take advantage of Rengar's passive.øºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøRengar gains an empowered ability when his resource bar is full. Try to confront him when it's low.øºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºRengar's passive enables him to leap out of brush, so avoid fighting him when near bushes.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøRengar's ultimate grants him temporary stealth, so try to avoid traveling alone when injured.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºSavageryº
spells.description:
ºøºøºøºøRengar's next basic attack deals bonus damage and grants him increased Attack Speed.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøFerocity Bonus: Rengar deals enhanced damage and doubles his Attack Speed bonus.øºøºøºøº

ºøºøThe next basic attack within 6 seconds deals ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø physical damage. Grants ºøº{{ e5 }}ºø% Attack Speed for øº{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

ºøFerocity bonus:ººø Additionally deals øº{{ e2 }}ºø% of Rengar's Attack Damageºøº (+º)ºøºøºø in bonus damage, and the Attack Speed bonus is doubled.ºøºøº

spells.name: ºBattle Roarº
spells.description:
ºøºøºøºøºøºRengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and gaining bonus Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºFerocity Bonus: Rengar heals for a large amount.ºøºøº

Deals º{{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºø magic damage to enemies in the area. Grants ºøºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøºø Armor and Magic resist for 3 seconds if an enemy is hit.ºøºøº

ºøFerocity bonus: ººøRengar restores º{{ f1 }}º Health.º

spells.name: ºBola Strikeº
spells.description:
ºøºøºøºRengar throws a bola at his target, slowing them for a short duration.ºøºøºøº
ºøºøFerocity Bonus: Roots the target for 1 second.ºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøThrows a bola dealing øº{{ e1 }} (+º{{ a1 }})ºøºø physical damage and slowing an enemy by øºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøº%, Enemy Movement Speed recovers over 2.5 seconds.ºøºøº

ºøFerocity bonus:ººø Roots the target for øº{{ e5 }}º second.º

spells.name: ºøThrill of the Huntøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºRengar activates his predatory instincts, stealthing and revealing all enemy Champions in a large radius around him. He gains Movement Speed and rapidly generates Ferocity while stealthed. ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøActivates predatory instincts stealthing Rengar after 1 second (delayed up to 3 seconds if taking damage), and revealing enemy Champions within ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e3 }} range.º

ºøRengar gains º{{ e1 }}ºøºøºø% Movement Speed and 5 Ferocity over 3.75 seconds. Lasts ºøºøº{{ f1 }}ºøºøºø seconds or until Rengar uses an ability that removes his stealth.ºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºøUnseen Predatorº
passive.description:
ºøºøºøºøWhile in brush or stealth Rengar will leap at the target when using his basic attack.ºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøRengar builds 1 point of Ferocity with each ability he uses on enemies. When reaching 5 points of Ferocity, Rengar's next ability becomes empowered, granting it a bonus effect.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
